docs.lead_paragraph: " The Moth and the Flame" interested me very much; its development held my attention completely, in spite of the extravagance of some of the dialogue, in the three strongest scenes, and I am sure that the seven or eight hundred other persons who were in the Lyceum Theatre Tuesday night would say the same thing in favor of Mr. Fitch's play, if they were asked about it.
